answers.answer: Hi,It will depend upon the cause of peripheral neuropathy. Peripheral neuropathy can occur due to B 12 deficiency, thyroid dysfunction or diabetes.These conditions can cause other symptoms also apart from symptoms due to peripheral neuropathy.It will help us to know what exactly your current symptoms are to comment further.Thanks
Its hard to describe, i feel unwell on and off, like i'm coming down with a virus then i'm ok my face burns, slight headache.

question: Do you feel unwell with peripheral neuropathy, i've no diagnosis yet but have all the symptoms but i feel unwell on & off. nothing specific just awful.
title: unwell
